question_text: Which of the following diagnostic results most clearly indicates a device is using APIPA?
answer_options: Ping to 8.8.8.8 fails, but ping to 192.168.1.1 succeeds
IP address shows 169.254.x.x and default gateway is blank
Device has an IPv6 address starting with FE80
correct_answer: IP address shows 169.254.x.x and default gateway is blank
explanation: APIPA assignments show 169.254.x.x with no gateway, indicating DHCP failure and fallback behavior.
